attributes.additional_details: I feel honestly ppl who sell the faulty car should get a fine for putting others at risk who don't know about the recalls, myself and my family got the car on finance and wasn't told of any danger or the car had any recall ppl life's are at risk
attributes.background: Lately alot of ppl on the vauxhall zafira b models don't know the risks about buying these cars like my self, Theirs been to many fires on the recall one so all I want is to try stop ppl selling zafira b models with only a recall 1 it should be a law.

rejection.details: It is not clear from the title of the petition what action you want the Government to take. You may want to consider resubmitting a petition with a title along the following lines "Make it illegal to knowingly sell a faulty car."
